description.value:
Piety: You [[/gain 2 hr]]{gain 2 piety} the first time in an encounter that you or a creature within 10 squares takes acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or sonic damage.

Prayer Effect: Vines whip up from the floor or ground within 10 squares, wrapping around a number of creatures equal to your Intuition score. You can slide each creature up to a number of squares equal to [[lookup @I]]{your Intuition score}. The vines then fade away.

uBzClK8HrUwTshV3.name: Skill (Exploration)
uBzClK8HrUwTshV3.description: Additionally, you gain a skill from the chosen domain.

ncSgiU5vDKGC7D6P.description: Choose one of your domains. You gain a domain feature for that domain.
